content:
"Spent some time in Italy," Filon finished, grinning. "I was studying abroad and decided to take a few cooking classes. I fell in love with the art of pizza making, and decided to bring some of those techniques back with me. I'm glad you all enjoyed it."

Ganyu nodded appreciatively, her eyes closed as she savored the flavors on her tongue. "This is truly a culinary masterpiece. I can't believe you managed to capture the authenticity of a Neapolitan-style pizza margherita here in Liyue. Your skills are truly impressive, Filon."

Ningguang, who had been hesitant to try the pizza at first, took another slice and nodded in agreement. "I have to admit, I was pleasantly surprised by this. Your cooking skills are quite impressive, Filon. You should consider opening a restaurant."

Filon chuckled at the suggestion. "I appreciate the compliment, but I'm afraid I'm not ready to take on such a daunting task. For now, I'm happy to share my love of cooking with friends and family."

As they finished the last slices of the delicious pizza, Filon couldn't help but feel a sense of pride and accomplishment. He had always enjoyed cooking, but sharing his passion with others and seeing their enjoyment was truly fulfilling. He made a mental note to continue honing his skills and experimenting with new dishes in the future.
